summary: This is a brief email correspondence from December 7, 2020, transmitting a courtesy copy of a legal filing made by Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team in response to a letter from the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and communication regarding her detention conditions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email and the attached legal filing. She is identified by her BOP register number (02879-509), indicating she is in federal custody.

events.title: Maxwell Defense Files Response to MDC
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team files a response to a letter from the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), the facility where she is held.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 7, 2020, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell (BOP #02879-509).
It transmits a courtesy copy of a legal filing made in response to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
This indicates ongoing legal activity and communication regarding Maxwell's detention conditions during her pre-trial incarceration.
